name: Battle Spirit
description:
Fight characters using my own original battle system.

If you haven enjoyed this game, and especially if you want more, please donate! I have great ideas in how to expand and improve this game a lot.

Also, if you donate, I can expand the game while keeping it free, if I get enough money. Eventually the game will cost money as it becomes bigger- but no more than $2. 99, but if you contact me and make a big enough donation (which shouldn't be bigger than $5-10), I could send you a free copy of the full version of the game.
